Class: MaiaRecorder

MaiaRecorder(options) → {object}

new MaiaRecorder(options) → {object}

MaiaScript screen recorder library.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
options object Object containing options for configuring the recorder. It can be: startButton, pauseButton, stopButton, playButton, saveButton, videoPlayer, fileNamePrefix, mimeType.
